tussle.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a fight using a lot of energy, in which two people get hold of each other and struggle
tussle.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: After quite a tussle, I finally wrenched the letter from him.
tussle.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a struggle or argument in which people try to beat each other to get something
tussle.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: his defeat in the leadership tussle
tussle.translation[1].definitions[0].def: to fight or struggle without using any weapons, by pulling or pushing someone rather than hitting them
tussle.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: He was tussling with the other boys.
tussle.translation[1].definitions[1].def: to try to beat someone in order to get something
tussle.translation[1].definitions[1].exa: They tussled for first place in the race.
